value:
Is everyone here a Hero summoned
from somewhere else?

I have no memories from before
the time I met Chrom. But I still
have a fine mind for tactics.$k$pOh, you too? How intriguing.

Back home, I was always checking
on everyone, too. It helps me relax,
knowing they're safe and well.

Do you have a moment to go over
some tactical options? I'd love to
hear your thoughts.

This kingdom has some amazing
authors! ...Oh, ah, is it OK if I borrow
books from the library?

Nice to meet you. I'm
Robin.$k$pI was asked to come say
hello by your good friend
$Nf.

Even I couldn't have seen this
coming!
This is all part of the plan.
Er, is that it?

I'm glad you see my strategic
value to the team.

Hello, I'm Robin. I'm a tactician
for the Shepherds, so let me
know if you need a battle plan.

I appreciate the opportunity you've
given me to observe your battle
tactics in depth.$k$pEvery time we head out, I can't
help but be proud that you've
chosen me to fight at your side.$k$pBut I do feel bad for interfering
with the bonding process between
partners.$k$pYou and Alfonse share something
special, right? Similar to the bond
between Chrom and me?$k$pBut there is also an understanding
between fellow tacticians, and I
vow to support you to the end.
えい！
はあっ！
うあっ！
Part of the plan...
Time to tip the scales!
Here's how it's done!
Wrong move!
Our bonds give me strength!
Oops.
Heehee
We'll win our next battle—I guarantee it.
Did you say something? I was just planning...
Odd to think I came out of that divine...thing.
I don't know why, but I feel a strange kinship with you.
Oh, good—I've still got my memories of being in Ylisse.
I wonder if Chrom is around here...
I want you to know you can count on me out in the field.
Hmm.
Lead on.
Let's go.
Where did I wake up this time?
